name: CUSTOM Testimonials #36
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign layout_height = section.settings.layout_height
  assign layout_fixed_height = section.settings.layout_fixed_height
  assign layout_gap = section.settings.layout_gap

  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign scrolling_velocity = section.settings.scrolling_velocity
  assign scrolling_velocity_mobile = section.settings.scrolling_velocity_mobile
  assign reverse_direction = section.settings.reverse_direction
  assign scrolling_mt_mobile = section.settings.scrolling_mt_mobile
  assign pause_hover = section.settings.pause_hover
  assign use_autoscroll_mobile = section.settings.use_autoscroll_mobile

  assign columns_gap = section.settings.columns_gap
  assign columns_gap_mobile = section.settings.columns_gap_mobile

  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius

  assign card_ratio = section.settings.card_ratio
  assign card_ratio_mobile = section.settings.card_ratio_mobile
  
  assign play_icon_size = section.settings.play_icon_size
  assign play_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.play_icon_size_mobile
  assign play_icon_color = section.settings.play_icon_color
  assign play_icon_color_active = section.settings.play_icon_color_active
  assign play_icon_bg_color = section.settings.play_icon_bg_color
  assign play_icon_bg_color_active = section.settings.play_icon_bg_color_active
  assign play_icon_radius = section.settings.play_icon_radius

  assign author_content_mt = section.settings.author_content_mt
  assign author_content_mt_mobile = section.settings.author_content_mt_mobile

  assign author_custom = section.settings.author_custom
  assign author_font = section.settings.author_font
  assign author_size = section.settings.author_size
  assign author_size_mobile = section.settings.author_size_mobile
  assign author_height = section.settings.author_height
  assign author_color = section.settings.author_color    
  assign author_mt = section.settings.author_mt
  assign author_mt_mobile = section.settings.author_mt_mobile
  assign author_icon_color = section.settings.author_icon_color

  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color

  assign badge_size = section.settings.badge_size
  assign badge_size_mobile = section.settings.badge_size_mobile
  assign badge_custom = section.settings.badge_custom
  assign badge_font = section.settings.badge_font
  assign badge_height = section.settings.badge_height
  assign badge_color = section.settings.badge_color
  assign badge_padding_horizontal = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal
  assign badge_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign badge_padding_vertical = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical
  assign badge_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign badge_radius = section.settings.badge_radius
  assign badge_bg_color = section.settings.badge_bg_color
  assign badge_icon_color = section.settings.badge_icon_color

  assign first_row_count = 0
  assign second_row_count = 0
  assign third_row_count = 0
  
  for block in section.blocks
    if block.type == 'card'
      if block.settings.row == 'first_row'
        assign first_row_count = first_row_count | plus: 1
      elsif block.settings.row == "second_row"
        assign second_row_count = second_row_count | plus: 1
      elsif block.settings.row == "third_row"
        assign third_row_count = third_row_count | plus: 1
      endif
    endif  
  endfor
  
  assign loading_attribute = 'lazy'
  unless lazy
    assign loading_attribute = 'eiger'
  endunless
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  author_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  badge_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .testimonials-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    height: 100%;
  }  

  .testimonials-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    width: 100%;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }
  
  .testimonials-button-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
  }

  .testimonials-button-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .testimonials-scrolling-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    gap: {{ columns_gap_mobile }}px;
    width: 60%;
  }

  .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 1 0;
    display: none;
    background-attachment: scroll !important;
    transform-origin: bottom;
    flex-direction: column;
    height: 0;
    transform: translateY(-100vh);
    position: relative;
    gap: {{ columns_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -ms-flex-wrap: nowrap;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    background-attachment: scroll !important;
    transform-origin: center;
    width: 200vw;
    position: relative;
    left: -100vw;
    margin-top: {{ scrolling_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-scrolling-list-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    align-items: stretch;
    white-space: nowrap;
    background-attachment: scroll !important;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    margin-left: {{ columns_gap_mobile }}px;
    gap: {{ columns_gap_mobile }}px;
    -webkit-animation: tickerMobile{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity_mobile }}s infinite linear;
    animation: tickerMobile{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity_mobile }}s infinite linear;
  }

  .testimonials-scrolling-list-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    white-space: nowrap;
    background-attachment: scroll !important;
    gap: {{ columns_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-scrolling-list-mobile-{{ section.id }} .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 200px;
  }

  .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-decoration: none;
    position: relative;
  }

  .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} img,
  .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} video,
  .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    border: 0px;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }
  
  
  .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 15px;
    left: 15px;
    padding: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: {{ play_icon_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ play_icon_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.5 }};
    backdrop-filter: blur(0.75rem);
  }

  .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }}.active {
    background-color: {{ play_icon_bg_color_active | hex_to_rgba: 0.5 }};
  }

  .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    background-color: transparent !important;
    width: {{ play_icon_size_mobile }}px !important;
    height: {{ play_icon_size_mobile }}px !important;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }}.active svg:nth-child(1) rect {
    fill: {{ play_icon_color_active }};
  }

  .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }} svg:nth-child(2) path {
    fill: {{ play_icon_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }} svg:nth-child(1) {
    display: none;
  }

  .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }}.active svg:nth-child(1) {
    display: block;
  }

  .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }}.active svg:nth-child(2) {
    display: none;
  }

  .testimonials-author-item-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .testimonials-author-item-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: block;
    webkit-animation: anim{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 1s;
    animation: anim{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 1s;
  }

    
  @keyframes anim{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
    0% {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(20px);
    }

    100% {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0px);
    }
  }

  .testimonials-author-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;   
    display: block; 
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-wrap: wrap;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }  

  .testimonials-author-content-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ author_content_mt_mobile }}px;
  }
  
  .testimonials-author-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    gap: 5px;
    margin-top: {{ author_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    display: block; 
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ author_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ author_color }};
    line-height: {{ author_height }}%;
  }   

  .testimonials-author-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: {{ author_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ author_size_mobile }}px;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-author-icon-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ author_icon_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-badge-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 5px;
    padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ badge_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.4 }};
    border-radius: {{ badge_radius }}px;
    backdrop-filter: blur(0.75rem);
    position: absolute;
    top: 15px;
    left: 15px;
  }

  .testimonials-badge-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    display: block; 
    font-size: {{ badge_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ badge_color }};
    line-height: {{ badge_height }}%;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .testimonials-badge-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: {{ badge_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ badge_size_mobile }}px;
    object-fit: cover;
    background-color: transparent !important;
  }

  .testimonials-badge-icon-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ badge_icon_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    margin-top: {{ scrolling_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    min-width: 0 !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    overflow: visible !important;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .testimonials-button-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .testimonials-button-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }

    .testimonials-body-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ layout_gap }}px;    
    }

    .testimonials-content-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 40%;
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .testimonials-scrolling-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
      gap: {{ columns_gap }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      display: -webkit-box;
      display: -ms-flexbox;
      display: flex;
      gap: {{ columns_gap }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .testimonials-scrolling-list-{{ section.id }} {
      display: -webkit-box;
      display: -ms-flexbox;
      display: flex;
      gap: {{ columns_gap }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-scrolling-list-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-{{ section.id }}:first-child .testimonials-scrolling-list-{{ section.id }} {
      -webkit-animation: tickerUp{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity | plus: 5 }}s infinite linear;
      animation: tickerUp{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity | plus: 5 }}s infinite linear;
    }

    .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(2) .testimonials-scrolling-list-{{ section.id }} {
      -webkit-animation: tickerDown{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity }}s infinite linear;
      animation: tickerDown{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity }}s infinite linear;
    }


    .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(3) .testimonials-scrolling-list-{{ section.id }} {
      -webkit-animation: tickerUp{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity | plus: 10 }}s infinite linear;
      animation: tickerUp{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity | plus: 10 }}s infinite linear;
    }

    .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(4) .testimonials-scrolling-list-{{ section.id }} {
      -webkit-animation: tickerDown{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity }}s infinite linear;
      animation: tickerDown{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ scrolling_velocity }}s infinite linear;
    }

    .testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ play_icon_size }}px !important;
      height: {{ play_icon_size }}px !important;
    }

    .testimonials-author-content-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ author_content_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-author-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;   
    }  

    .testimonials-author-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
      margin-top: {{ author_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} { 
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
      font-size: {{ author_size }}px;
    }  

    .testimonials-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid;
      margin-top: {{ scrolling_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-author-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ author_size }}px;
      height: {{ author_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-caption-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ author_size }}px;
      height: {{ author_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-badge-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ badge_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-author-text-{{ section.id }} *  {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if author_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-author-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ author_font.family }}, {{ author_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ author_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ author_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if badge_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ badge_font.family }}, {{ badge_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ badge_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ badge_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if layout_height == "full_screen" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-{{ section.id }} {
      min-height: 95vh;
    } 
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {      
      .testimonials-{{ section.id }} {
        height: 95vh;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif layout_height == 'fixed_height' %}  
  <style>     
    .testimonials-{{ section.id }} {
      height: 100%;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-{{ section.id }} {
        height: {{ layout_fixed_height }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if card_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif card_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif card_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if card_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif card_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif card_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if reverse_direction %}
	<style>
    @keyframes tickerUp{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        transform: translateY(-100%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translateY(0%);
      }
    }

    @keyframes tickerDown{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        transform: translateY(0%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translateY(-100%);
      }
    }

    @keyframes tickerMobile{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        transform: translateX(-100%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translateX(0%);
      }
    }
	</style>
{% else %}
	<style>

    @keyframes tickerUp{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        transform: translateY(0%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translateY(-100%);
      }
    }

    @keyframes tickerDown{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        transform: translateY(-100%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translateY(0%);
      }
    }

    @keyframes tickerMobile{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        transform: translateX(0%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translateX(-100%);
      }
    }
	</style>
{% endif %}

{% if pause_hover %}
	<style>
      .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-{{ section.id }}:hover .testimonials-scrolling-list-{{ section.id }} {
        animation-play-state: paused;
      }

      .testimonials-scrolling-wrap-mobile-{{ section.id }}.paused .testimonials-scrolling-list-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
        animation-play-state: paused;
      }
	</style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'caption' %}
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.caption_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .testimonials-caption-wrapper-{{ block.id }} {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 5px;
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.caption_mt_mobile }}px;
        }

        .testimonials-caption-icon-{{ block.id }} svg {
          display: block;
          width: {{ block.settings.caption_size_mobile }}px;
          height: {{ block.settings.caption_size_mobile }}px;
          object-fit: cover;
        }

        .testimonials-caption-icon-{{ block.id }} svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.caption_icon_color }};
        }
      
        .testimonials-caption-{{ block.id }} {
          margin: 0;       
          text-align: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
          font-size: {{ block.settings.caption_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.caption_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.caption_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          word-break: break-word;
        }

        .testimonials-caption-{{ block.id }} * strong {
          text-decoration: underline {{ block.settings.caption_border_color }};
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {  
          .testimonials-caption-wrapper-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.caption_mt }}px;
          }        
        
          .testimonials-caption-{{ block.id }} {
            text-align: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
            font-size: {{ block.settings.caption_size }}px;
          }

          .testimonials-caption-icon-{{ block.id }} svg {
            width: {{ block.settings.caption_size }}px;
            height: {{ block.settings.caption_size }}px;
          }
        }          
      </style>
        
      {% if block.settings.caption_custom %}
        <style>
          .testimonials-caption-{{ block.id }} {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.caption_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.caption_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.caption_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.caption_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
    {% when 'heading' %}  
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .testimonials-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
        }
      
        .testimonials-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          word-break: break-word;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        .testimonials-heading-{{ block.id }} * strong {
          text-decoration: underline {{ block.settings.heading_border_color }};
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          
          .testimonials-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
          }
        
          .testimonials-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }
        }          
      </style>
        
      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .testimonials-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'text' %}   
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
        
        .testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
        }
      
        .testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          
          .testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{  content_horizontal_align }};
          }
      
          .testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
          }
          
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
        <style>
          .testimonials-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
          }
        </style>          
      {% endif %}  

    {% when 'button' %}  
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }} {
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          max-width: fit-content;
          gap: 10px;
          width: 100%;
          margin: 0;         
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.button_mt_mobile }}px;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.button_height }}%;
          text-align: center;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
          border-radius: {{ block.settings.button_radius }}px;
          transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
          background-color: transparent;
          border: 0px;
          cursor: pointer;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        .testimonials-button-inner-{{ block.id }} {
          margin: 0px;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 10px;
          text-decoration: none;
        }

        .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
          color: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }} svg {
          width: 14px;
          height: 14px;
        }

        .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }} svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }}:hover svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
          .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.button_mt }}px;
            padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal }}px;
            font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.button_custom %}
        <style>
          .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }} {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.button_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.button_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.button_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.button_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline" or block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
        <style>
          .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }} {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_color }};
          }
      
          .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "outline" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
        <style>          
          .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }} {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            border: {{  block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{  block.settings.button_border_color }};
          }
      
          .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
            border: {{  block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings. button_border_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "link" %}
        <style>
          .testimonials-button-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: 0px !important;
            -webkit-box-shadow: none !important;
            -moz-box-shadow: none !important;
            box-shadow: none !important;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}        
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}

{% capture first_list %}
  <div class="testimonials-scrolling-list-{{ section.id }}">
    {% for item in (1..3) %}
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% if block.type == 'card' %}
          {% if block.settings.row == 'first_row' %}          
            <div class="testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }}">
              {% if block.settings.media_type == 'video' %}           
                {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
                {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                {%- if block.settings.video == null and block.settings.video_url != null -%}
                {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                <iframe
                  {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"      
                  data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=1&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  data-src3="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&playsinline=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"       
                  allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                  allowfullscreen
                  class="lazy"
                ></iframe>
                {%- else -%}
                <iframe
                  {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&muted=0&muted=1&autoplay=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"             
                  data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=1&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  data-src3="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=0&playsinline=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                  allowfullscreen
                  class="lazy"
                ></iframe>
                {% endif %}
                {% else %}
                  {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
                  <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{% if block.settings.video != blank %}{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" playsinline loop preload="none" preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>
                {% endif %} 
                <div class="testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }}">           
                  <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><rect x="9" y="5" width="1.5" height="14" rx="0.75" fill="#22202F"></rect><rect x="14" y="5" width="1.5" height="14" rx="0.75" fill="#22202F"></rect></svg>         
                  <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M18.5 11.134C19.1667 11.5189 19.1667 12.4811 18.5 12.866L9.5 18.0622C8.83333 18.4471 8 17.966 8 17.1962L8 6.80385C8 6.03405 8.83333 5.55292 9.5 5.93782L18.5 11.134Z" fill="#22202F"></path></svg>
                </div>      
              {% elsif block.settings.media_type == 'image' %}            
                {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                  {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                    {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 700 | image_tag:
                      loading: loading_attribute,
                      sizes: sizes,
                      widths: '535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                    }}
                {% else %}
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                {% endif %}        
              {% endif %}
              <div class="testimonials-badge-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.author != blank %}
                  <p class="testimonials-badge-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.author }}</p>
                {% endif %}
                <div class="testimonials-badge-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 16 16" role="presentation" class="SvgStyled-sc-46066da4-0 jZDnMB"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.6501 8C2.6501 5.04528 5.04537 2.65 8.0001 2.65C10.9548 2.65 13.3501 5.04528 13.3501 8C13.3501 10.9547 10.9548 13.35 8.0001 13.35C5.04537 13.35 2.6501 10.9547 2.6501 8ZM8.0001 1.35C4.3274 1.35 1.3501 4.3273 1.3501 8C1.3501 11.6727 4.3274 14.65 8.0001 14.65C11.6728 14.65 14.6501 11.6727 14.6501 8C14.6501 4.3273 11.6728 1.35 8.0001 1.35ZM7.52706 10.2763L11.3437 6.45962L10.4245 5.54038L7.07135 8.89351L5.7376 7.53696L4.81061 8.44837L6.60394 10.2724L7.06353 10.7398L7.52706 10.2763Z" fill="var(--color-text-primary, #1a1a1a)"></path></svg>
                </div>
              </div>  
            </div>            
          {% endif %}                 
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
    {% endfor %}
  
  </div>
{% endcapture %}

{% capture list_mobile %}

          {% if block.settings.media_type == 'video' %}           
            {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
            {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}

            {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
            <iframe
              {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"      
              data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=1&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"

              allowfullscreen
              class="lazy"
            ></iframe>
            {%- else -%}
            <iframe
              {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&muted=0&muted=1&autoplay=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"

              allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
              allowfullscreen
              class="lazy"
            ></iframe>
            {% endif %}
            {% else %}
              {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
              <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{% if block.settings.video != blank %}{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" playsinline loop preload="none" preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>
            {% endif %}

              <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M18.5 11.134C19.1667 11.5189 19.1667 12.4811 18.5 12.866L9.5 18.0622C8.83333 18.4471 8 17.966 8 17.1962L8 6.80385C8 6.03405 8.83333 5.55292 9.5 5.93782L18.5 11.134Z" fill="#22202F"></path></svg>
            </div>       
          {% elsif block.settings.media_type == 'image' %}            
            {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
              {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 700 | image_tag:

                                {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 700 | image_tag:

{% if lazy %}
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
{% endif %}
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initTestimonials36() {
    {% if lazy %}
      let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

      window.addEventListener(
        "LazyLoad::Initialized",
        function (event) {
          window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
        },
        false
      );
    {% endif %}

    {% unless use_autoscroll_mobile %}
      const slider = new Swiper(".testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
        speed: 300,
        loop: true,    
        breakpoints: {
          320: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector('.testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}').dataset.gapMobile || 0),
            slidesPerView: 2,
          },
          768: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector('.testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}').dataset.gap || 0),
            slidesPerView: 2,
          },
          1024: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector('.testimonials-slider-{{ section.id }}').dataset.gap || 0),
            slidesPerView: 2,
          }
        },
      }); 
    {% endunless %}

    const slides = document.querySelectorAll(".testimonials-author-item-{{ section.id }}");
    let currentIndex = 0;

    if (slides.length === 0) return;

    slides[0].classList.add("active");

    setInterval(() => {
      slides.forEach(slide => slide.classList.remove("active"));
      slides[currentIndex].classList.add("active");
      currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % slides.length;
    }, 3000);

    const medias = document.querySelectorAll('.testimonials-card-media-{{ section.id }}');

    if(medias) {
      medias.forEach(media => {
        const video = media.querySelector('video');
        const iframe = media.querySelector('iframe');      
        const videoButton = media.querySelector('.testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }}');   

        if(videoButton) {
          videoButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
            medias.forEach(media => {
              const otherVideo = media.querySelector('video');
              const otherIframe = media.querySelector('iframe');      
              const otherVideoButton = media.querySelector('.testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }}');                 

              if(otherVideo && otherVideoButton != videoButton) {
                otherVideo.pause();
              }
              
              if(otherIframe && otherVideoButton != videoButton) {
                otherIframe.src = otherIframe.getAttribute('data-src3');                  
              }
              
              if(otherVideoButton && otherVideoButton !== videoButton) {
                otherVideoButton.classList.remove('active');
              }
            });

            const scrollingWrap = document.querySelector('.testimonials-scrolling-wrap-mobile-{{ section.id }}');
            const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 1024;
            
            if (isMobile && scrollingWrap) {
              scrollingWrap.classList.add('paused');
            }
            
            setTimeout(() => {
              if(videoButton.classList.contains('active')) {
                if(video) {
                  video.pause();
                }
                if(iframe) {
                  iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src3');
                } 
              } else {
                if(video) {
                  video.play();
                }
                if(iframe) {
                  iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1');
                }     
              }  
              videoButton.classList.toggle('active'); 
              if (isMobile && scrollingWrap) {
                const anyActive = document.querySelector('.testimonials-media-play-{{ section.id }}.active');
                if (!anyActive) {
                  scrollingWrap.classList.remove('paused');
                }
              }
            }, 400)              
          })  
        }   
      })
    }

    function setMaxAuthorContentHeight() {
      const items = document.querySelectorAll('.testimonials-author-item-{{ section.id }}');
      const content = document.querySelector('.testimonials-author-content-{{ section.id }}');
      if (!items || !content) return;

      let maxHeight = 0;

      items.forEach(item => {
        const height = item.offsetHeight;
        if (height > maxHeight) {
          maxHeight = height;
        }
      });

      content.style.height = maxHeight + 'px';
    }

    setMaxAuthorContentHeight();
    window.addEventListener('resize', setMaxAuthorContentHeight);

    {% if layout_height == 'auto' %}
      function setTestimonialsHeight() {
        const content = document.querySelector('.testimonials-content-{{ section.id }}');
        const container = document.querySelector('.testimonials-{{ section.id }}');

        if (content && container) {
          if (window.innerWidth >= 1024) {
            const targetHeight = content.offsetHeight + 100;
            container.style.transition = 'height 0.4s ease';
            container.style.height = targetHeight + 'px';
          } else {
            container.style.transition = 'height 0.4s ease';
            container.style.height = '100%';
          }
        }
      }

      setTestimonialsHeight();

      window.addEventListener('resize', setTestimonialsHeight);
    {% endif %}
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initTestimonials36);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initTestimonials36);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initTestimonials36);
  }
</script>

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
